Typed in the @AttributeOverride annotation as below and received an NPE

@Entity
@Table(name="PETS")
@AttributeOverride
public class Pet extends NamedEntity {
	
}
java.lang.NullPointerException

Created an attachment (id=68137)
proposed patch

Fixed this issue and the constant resynching issue that appeared once the NPE was gone.  Fixed for attribute overrides and association overrides in entities as well as embedded mappings
